snippet: Olivier Rousteing carried on the house’s popular rocking minidresses, but added so much embellishment in the form of lattice-worked crystals and pearls, that you cannot imagine anyone possibly sitting down in one of his looks.
abstract: Olivier Rousteing carried on the house’s popular rocking minidresses, but added so much embellishment in the form of lattice-worked crystals and pearls, that you cannot imagine anyone possibly sitting down in one of his looks.

headline.main: Opulence in the Air at Balmain
headline.kicker: On the Runway Blog | Fast Fashion
